verses.verse: "Moreover, you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> as a <S%H4729>place<s%> for <S%H4729>burning<s%> <S%H7004>incense;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> it of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

"Its <S%H753>length<s%> [shall be] a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> it shall be <S%H7251>square,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> [shall be] two <S%H520>cubits;<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> [shall be] of one piece with it.

"And you shall <S%H6823>overlay<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> its <S%H1406>top<s%> and its <S%H7023>sides<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> and its <S%H7161>horns;<s%> and you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> for it.

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it <S%H8478>under<s%> its <S%H2213>molding;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> [them] on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> <S%H6763>walls<s%> – on <S%H8147>opposite<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> – and they shall be <S%H1004>holders<s%> for <S%H905>poles<s%> with <S%H1992>which<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it.
"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlay<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> this altar in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil<s%> that is <S%H5921>near<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is <S%H5921>over<s%> [the ark of] the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you.

"And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it; he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it every <S%H1242>morning<s%> when he <S%H3190>trims<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps.<s%>

"And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5927>trims<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight,<s%> he shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense.<s%> [There shall be] <S%H8548>perpetual<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5927>offer<s%> any <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on this altar, or <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> or <S%H4503>meal<s%> <S%H4503>offering;<s%> and you shall not <S%H5258>pour<s%> out a <S%H5262>libation<s%> on it.

"And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on its <S%H7161>horns<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> a <S%H8141>year;<s%> he shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on it with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%> It is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> you <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H7218>census<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H6485>number<s%> them, then <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of them shall <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for <S%H5315>himself<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when you <S%H6485>number<s%> them, that there may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5063>plague<s%> among them when you <S%H6485>number<s%> them.

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is what <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H6485>numbered<s%> shall <S%H5414>give:<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> (the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%>), <S%H4276>half<s%> a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> as a <S%H8641>contribution<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Everyone<s%> who is <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>over,<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"The <S%H6223>rich<s%> shall not <S%H7235>pay<s%> <S%H7235>more,<s%> and the <S%H1800>poor<s%> shall not <S%H4591>pay<s%> <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H4276>half<s%> <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> when you <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5315>yourselves.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3725>atonement<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> that it may be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H5315>yourselves.<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"You shall also <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3595>laver<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> with its <S%H3653>base<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> for <S%H7364>washing;<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.
"And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> from it;

when they <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they may not <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> when they <S%H5066>approach<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H8334>minister,<s%> by <S%H6999>offering<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> a <S%H801>fire<s%> [sacrifice] to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"So they shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> that they may not <S%H4191>die;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute<s%> for them, for Aaron and his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"
Moreover, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>"Take<s%> also for yourself the <S%H7218>finest<s%> of <S%H1314>spices:<s%> of <S%H1865>flowing<s%> <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [shekels,] and of <S%H1314>fragrant<s%> <S%H7076>cinnamon<s%> <S%H4276>half<s%> as <S%H4276>much,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> and of <S%H1314>fragrant<s%> <S%H7070>cane<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%>
and of <S%H6916>cassia<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> a <S%H1969>hin.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> of these a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> a <S%H7545>perfume<s%> <S%H4842>mixture,<s%> the <S%H7660>work<s%> of a <S%H7543>perfumer;<s%> it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
"And with it you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%>
and the <S%H7979>table<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand.<s%>
"You shall also <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them, that they may be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy;<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> them shall be <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> them, that they may <S%H3547>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to Me.

"And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> to Me throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

'It shall not be <S%H5480>poured<s%> on anyone's <S%H1320>body,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall you <S%H6213>make<s%> [any] <S%H3644>like<s%> it, in the same <S%H4971>proportions;<s%> it is <S%H6944>holy,<s%> [and] it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you.

<S%H376>'Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H7543>mix<s%> <S%H4480>[any<s%>] <S%H3644>like<s%> it, or <S%H834>whoever<s%> <S%H5414>puts<s%> any of it on a <S%H2114>layman,<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> for yourself <S%H5561>spices,<s%> <S%H5198>stacte<s%> and <S%H7827>onycha<s%> and <S%H2464>galbanum,<s%> <S%H5561>spices<s%> with <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense;<s%> there shall be an equal <S%H905>part<s%> of <S%H905>each.<s%>

"And with it you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> a <S%H7545>perfume,<s%> the <S%H7660>work<s%> of a <S%H7543>perfumer,<s%> <S%H4414>salted,<s%> <S%H2889>pure,<s%> [and] <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H7833>beat<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of it <S%H1854>very<s%> <S%H1854>fine,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> part of it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I shall <S%H3259>meet<s%> with you; it shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you.

"And the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make,<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> in the same <S%H4971>proportions<s%> for yourselves; it shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to you for the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H376>"Whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> [any] <S%H3644>like<s%> it, to <S%H9552>use<s%> as <S%H9552>perfume,<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>"
